content: I am in a difficult situation, I'm 17 and i am doing classes online at Florida Virtual School. I was wondering if the Air Force would accept a GED to join or does it HAVE to be a High School Diploma. I was thinking about joining the Air Force directly after my 18th birthday, but i just need to know what i need to do. Any advice for someone just starting out would be greatly appreciated. you can contact me through my email: Contact member through profile e-mail I really appreciate it, -Roy This message has been edited. Last edited by: gypsysnipe, Tue 03 March 2009 09:15 AM

content: Roy, first don't post your personal e-mail for your peace of mind.People can contact you through your PM in your profile. You might get the answer you are seeking if you post inthe Air Force forum! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
